name: The Rainbow World
description:
A kingdom fallen, a prince exiled.

Restore her glory, his journey begins.

Features:

Exploration
Explore a big and interconnected world, gaining new abilities to take on new areas!


Combat
Mix of Top-down shooter and Hack-and-slash combat, with multiple skills for different enemies.


Air Combat
Jump into your airship to explore and fight in the air.


Platforming
Use combat abilities to traverse the terrain.


Chill in Town
Discover towns and other locales through your journey.
